item.title: Merge PDFS Using Python
item.description: Merge PDFs Using Python Working with PDF files can a pain…but it doesn’t have to be. You don’t even need any expensive software to do that: just a few lines of Python code. Tip! Some basic Python knowldege required! Gather all PDFs you want to merge in the same folder. In the .py file Import PyPDF2 python library Import PdfMerger class Loop over the pdf files (it is handy to have them all in the same folder so you don’t have to specify the full path) Create a new pdf file with merger.
